title: St. Gallen Cathedral
description: An iconic cathedral known for its stunning baroque architecture and historical significance.

title: Abbey Library
description: Home to ancient manuscripts and a magnificent collection of medieval books in a striking architectural setting.

title: Textile Museum
description: Discover the rich history of textile production in the region through interactive exhibits and artifacts.

title: Old Town St. Gallen
description: Wander through narrow, historic streets lined with centuries-old buildings and vibrant local culture.

title: St. Gallen Art Museum
description: Featuring a mix of contemporary and historical art pieces displayed in a modern, spacious gallery.

title: Wildpark Peter and Paul
description: A family-friendly park offering a chance to observe local wildlife in a natural, open setting.

title: Botanical Gardens
description: Enjoy a serene stroll through beautifully landscaped gardens featuring a diverse range of plant species.

title: St. Gallen Market
description: Experience the local flavor with fresh produce, artisan crafts, and a lively atmosphere at this bustling market.
